About Me

A little about me ....

BIO

I don’t stop at “good enough” but strive to have the best solution for the problem that’s set before me. I have a need to know how things work, and why they are the way they are. This drive is why, when I left the field, I started to deep dive in the world of my second passion of internal combustion and its associated systems. I love to learn new things, for example, over the last couple of years I have taught myself how to design and manufacture products with new software and G-code and then produce them on a hobbyist CNC machine. I’m also in the process of learning to code for the Arduino platform. I’ll use all the resources at my disposal to help me accomplish the goals I have associated with each of these platforms and will continue to do so, such as journals, articles, books, videos and any other media or information that are relevant.
